about_the_game:
Expand your flourishing business of beautiful vineyards and lush olive orchards with compact, but powerful and versatile tractors by historic Italian manufacturer Antonio Carraro. They allow you to operate extremely maneuverable in special conditions, where other tractors can’t handle the terrain with steep gradients and narrow spaces.

Because working between grape vines and olives groves, two of the new crop types in Farming Simulator 22, requires you to operate special equipment, the Antonio Carraro Pack includes exactly what you need - a variety of tractors like the classic Supertigre 635, the versatile TTR 7600 Infinity or the articulated reversible quadtrack flagship, the MACH 4 R.

The Italian company is a leading expert in creating solutions for farmers working in specialized agricultural fields. Extremely compact construction combined with tight turning circles and optimal visibility to all sides allow you to reach every single vine and grove of your orchard. Especially useful are the reversible driving seats, allowing you to change direction in an instant.
detailed_description:
Expand your flourishing business of beautiful vineyards and lush olive orchards with compact, but powerful and versatile tractors by historic Italian manufacturer Antonio Carraro. They allow you to operate extremely maneuverable in special conditions, where other tractors can’t handle the terrain with steep gradients and narrow spaces.

Because working between grape vines and olives groves, two of the new crop types in Farming Simulator 22, requires you to operate special equipment, the Antonio Carraro Pack includes exactly what you need - a variety of tractors like the classic Supertigre 635, the versatile TTR 7600 Infinity or the articulated reversible quadtrack flagship, the MACH 4 R.

The Italian company is a leading expert in creating solutions for farmers working in specialized agricultural fields. Extremely compact construction combined with tight turning circles and optimal visibility to all sides allow you to reach every single vine and grove of your orchard. Especially useful are the reversible driving seats, allowing you to change direction in an instant.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 or AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R7 265 or better (min 2GB VRAM, DX11/DX12 support)
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that influence the functionality in some cases.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5675C or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 570 or better (min 6GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that influence the functionality in some cases.

name: Farming Simulator 22 - ANTONIO CARRARO Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 / AMD FX-8350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB) / Radeon R9 390X (8 GB)
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements can´t cover all possible system configurations so issues could occur that influence the functionality in some cases.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5675C / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1060 (6 GB) / Radeon RX 570 (8 GB)
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: Expand your business of beautiful vineyards and lush olive orchards with compact specialty tractors by historic Italian manufacturer Antonio Carraro. They allow you to operate extremely maneuverable in challenging conditions, like terrain with steep gradients and narrow spaces.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Norwegian, Spanish - Latin America
